feature.label: %featureName
feature.description: The Qompass tool suite is a component based design methodology based on - A profile derived from a flexible component model (FCM) with - extensible port definitions (kind) - extensible set of connector types and implementations - extensible set of container services - A library of predefined port kinds - A library of connector types along with their implementations - The tool chain supporting a set of model-to-model transformation (connector and container expansion) - A C++ code generator - CDT support, i.e. the generation of a CDT project from the model
